ygData.subject: Re: I feel a nerf a coming...
ygData.msgSnippet: Good thing I did those quest first thing after they opened Temple Ro even though I don t wear any of it =P Seriously tho the bard quests seem to be some of the
ygData.messageBody:
Good thing I did those quest first thing after they opened Temple Ro even
though I don't wear any of it =P

Seriously tho the bard quests seem to be some of the easiest there. Some of
the cleric quests are easy - pick up an item off the ground in Mistmoore,
get an item off a giant dark bone, bleh. I REALLY think they need to
re-think putting a required item for the cleric bp on BILGE (of all spawns
in the game) somewhere else. I think the bp is junk, but STILL...

-Sartori D'Elsiraad
50th Bard of Quellious
-Stace Stormraven
35th Druid of Tunare
Veeshan


>From: "Tim Burke" <tjohnburke@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] I feel a nerf a coming...
>Date: Thu, 30 Dec 1999 01:00:25 -0500
>
>Just checked EQVault, and there is a post from Gordon about quest armor.
>Said something about the quest armor being more difficult for some classes
>than others, and expect changes in the next few patches. Ya'll smell that
>nerf headed straight for us, or am I just paranoid?
>
>My pally friend cries bloody freakin' murder everytime I ask him to help me
>to get another piece of lambent.
>
>Also, did anybody notice shields on barbarians? How come they fixed the
>shield graphic, but we are still strumming a stick, and not banging our my
>drums all day?
>
>Sorry if this sounds like whinny...
>
>Kerouac Dharmabum
>lvl 30 - Rodcent Nife
>
>
>[Attachments have been removed from this message]
